title: New: Wind & Walls – Holiday (Getaway)
content:
Just when you’d thought Australia had just about exhausted the dream-pop mines (those totally exist), Brisbane duo Wind & Walls come along with this rather fantastic debut outing.

Holiday (Getaway) (not a Madonna cover, as they’re all too keen to point out), is a reverb heavy, intricately composed gem, with the magical atmosphere more than making up for any possible misgivings surrounding the slightly basic production. With little information available on Wind & Walls (the male member also records under the name Boy Venus … I think…), aside from this track and references to Wild Nothing, The Middle East and John Mayer, it’ll be mightily interesting to see what the duo come up with next.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
